seo.title: Free Base64 Encoder Decoder Online Tool - UTF-8 Support | Base64 Pro
seo.description: Free Base64 encoder and decoder tool with UTF-8 support. Convert text to Base64 and decode Base64 strings instantly. Privacy-focused, works offline, supports international characters and emojis. Used by 10,000+ developers worldwide.

historical_context.text_2: Base64 encoding was developed in the early days of the internet to solve a fundamental problem: how to safely transmit binary data over text-based protocols like email and HTTP.
historical_context.text_4: Base64 was first standardized for Privacy Enhanced Mail
historical_context.text_8: Now used everywhere from web APIs to data URLs
historical_context.text_9: Today, Base64 is an essential part of modern web development, enabling everything from JWT tokens to inline images. Our tool continues this legacy by making Base64 accessible to developers worldwide!
